name: Infinity of Worlds
description:
Infinity of Worlds is a space shooter made for the "Epitech Game Jam #2022".

It's a spaceshooter inspired by classics (such as R-Type or Gleylancer) where you play a little spaceship in quest of discovering new worlds. But you will meet defeat multiples times, before evolving and evolving, getter more and more weapon to finally be able to explode the enemies and win the game. Will you beat the final boss? It's up to you.

Controls :

  1. - Space to shoot
  2. - Enter to validate
  3. - Arrows keys to move

(Note for non-Windows user : you can run it by the source code which is included with the game)
